channel.title: How to make custom items for server?
channel.description: I see that many servers have custom items but how do they create it? I want to create my own wepons and armor for my server. Can someone tell me the program they use to make it or give me a link? i would greatly appriciate it. Thank you.

item.title: How to make custom items for server?
item.dc:creator: @cheeksahoy cheeksahoy
item.description:
@cheeksahoy wrote:

[quote author=pk3r john link=topic=409242.msg3020532#msg3020532 date=1257555833]

[quote author=sonicforce41 link=topic=409242.msg3020465#msg3020465 date=1257551430]
well if you want to create it you have to good at design and plus you need to know how to use model creators. or if you want to use others. simply download them. copy their int’s and for 317 go to class8.java and for 508’s go to applet_sub1.java and put it there. and copy the models dat’s and into the model folder in your client and go to your server file and click item.cfg and pick an item id that you want the people to wear… for example… team capes who wants it… replace custom model capes with team capes… and compile and edit stats if you want too. and wallahh and btw for 317 open client and type “add model ####”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2009, 05:51:31 pm[/size][hr]Btw please give me repss++++++

Oh wow… I don’t remember when I posted this, but thank you very much. I needed that info Oh and that reminds me, Where can I get 508 customs? I dled a list of cutoms but my friend said that they were all 317s and wont work?

Rep+!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make custom items for server?

item.title: How to make custom items for server?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

sonicforce41:

well if you want to create it you have to good at design and plus you need to know how to use model creators. or if you want to use others. simply download them. copy their int’s and for 317 go to class8.java and for 508’s go to applet_sub1.java and put it there. and copy the models dat’s and into the model folder in your client and go to your server file and click item.cfg and pick an item id that you want the people to wear… for example… team capes who wants it… replace custom model capes with team capes… and compile and edit stats if you want too. and wallahh and btw for 317 open client and type “add model ####”[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 06, 2009, 05:51:31 pm[/size][hr]Btw please give me repss++++++

Retard, don’t beg for rep.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make custom items for server?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

You’d want to look at the modelling section, possibly refer to SilentCJ’s tutorial on how to make models, or custom items as you call them. You need to download 1 or more programs for this also.
